body_html:
here is more detailed descriptions of the steps I had madeafter cuDNN unzip one needs to copy *.h files to /usr/local/cuda/include and *.so and *.a from lib64 folder to /usr/local/cuda/lib64
after the copy make sure to set cudnn libs as follows
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 17 May 22 15:26 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.7.1.4
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 17 May 22 15:26 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.1.4
-rwxr-xr-x. 1 root root 339920048 May 19 20:00 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7.1.4
-rw-r--r--. 1 root root 331122430 May 19 20:00 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn_static.a

if this is not setup tensorflow compilation will fail later with unresolved symbols in cudnn.
also after symbolic links are setup make sure to run ldconfig as root.

body:
here is more detailed descriptions of the steps I had madeafter cuDNN unzip one needs to copy *.h files to /usr/local/cuda/include and *.so and *.a from lib64 folder to /usr/local/cuda/lib64
after the copy make sure to set cudnn libs as follows
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root        17 May 22 15:26 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.7.1.4
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root        17 May 22 15:26 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.1.4
-rwxr-xr-x. 1 root root 339920048 May 19 20:00 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7.1.4
-rw-r--r--. 1 root root 331122430 May 19 20:00 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn_static.a

if this is not setup tensorflow compilation will fail later with unresolved symbols in cudnn. 
also after symbolic links are setup  make sure to run ldconfig as root.
